name: fakee bug
description: 3050 DC, the world is no longer as used to be , Our lovely planet is about to be burned under the inflation of it's mother sun , humanity or what's left from lost any hope of surviving . I need to leave this planet as soon as possible , I only have a suite that can bare the heat outside , my father has made it while he was making researches for the government , he told me before he pass away that it has "bug" on it , I really don't understand what he meant by that but staying here is not an option anymore , I know a place where i can find some  space ships that can take me out space and  maybe i could find another planet where i can continue my miserable life , my only hope in this is that suite that my father left for me and i hope that bug he told about "it's not a bug"...
